restrictionInstructions.dataDistribution: DISTRIBUTION STATEMENT D: DISTRIBUTION AUTHORIZED TO DOD AND DOD CONTRACTORS ONLY. CRITICAL TECHNOLOGY, JULY 2012. OTHER REQUESTS SHALL BE REFERRED TO NAVSEA 07L. NO SECONDARY DISTRIBUTION AUTHORIZED WITHOUT WRITTEN APPROVAL OF THE APPLICABLE NAVSEA PROGRAM MANAGEMENT OFFICE.

restrictionInstructions.dataDestruction: DESTRUCTION NOTICE: DESTROY BY ANY METHOD THAT WILL PREVENT DISCLOSURE OF CONTENTS OR RECONSTRUCTION OF THE DOCUMENT.

dmTitle.infoName: Default business rules exchange data module

levelledPara.title: Dehumidifier
levelledPara.para: The mixture of product gas, a small amount of byproduct gas and water vapor is discharged through the dehumidifier (HX-031G) to the atmosphere. The dehumidifier is a tube-in-shell heat exchanger (same as the chiller HX-635G). The product gas flows through the shell while CW flows through the tubes. Flow restrictor (FR-546G) maintains a CW flow of 1 ± 0.375 gpm (refer to paragraph 3.10). The product gas is dehumidified to a dew point below 60 degrees F and the condensed water (approximately one pint per hour) is returned to the inlet of the circulation pump for reuse.
